name: Space War (itch) (ViolentCrumble)
description:
Space Wars is a galaga type game i made in approx 14hrs for the May Jam.

Music was made by the talented Gary M from Game Dev league. - https://clyp.it/user/pklm5wkx contact him here > exkage@yahoo.com

All sound effects were made by me on a Blue Yeti.
All art was made by Kenney over at Kenney.nl

You can move using wasd or arrow keys
hold space to shoot.

Collect the blue tokens for upgrades, You can upgrade your guns, speed, fire rate and collect lives.

Large bosses start spawning at lvl 9 so try to be maxed out by then.

Screenshot your highscore and tweet to me at https://twitter.com/CrumblesGrumble
